blog.title: A Sansaery Ao3feed
blog.description: I want very much for you to be happy, Sansa

title: Where We Find Home
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yXkEJi

by Ainsleigh_Pauline

Sometimes you have to cross the Narrow Sea in order to find love whereas others may find love in those they grew up with or perhaps in unfamiliar Keeps with scary stories that sent shivers down your spine when you were a wee child. Sometimes you must have a broken betrothal and a bruised cheek in order to find the love of your life, the love of your life being a man you never would have thought could be the one you used to dream about whenever Mother read you fairytales. This is where we find home….this is where we find love.
~AU picking up after Ned ends Joffrey and Sansa’s betrothal due to his cruel treatment. Picking up a year after returning to Winterfell, Sansa meets the quiet yet kind Domeric Bolton who easily catches Sansa’s delicate heart. Meanwhile Arya is betrothed to Theon Greyjoy, the two are far more alike than either would care to admit, but it is done to keep Arya as far away from King Robert Baratheon’s vile desires~

Words: 3733, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin, Game of Thrones (TV)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/M, Multi
  • Characters: Sansa Stark, Domeric Bolton, Robb Stark, Myrcella Baratheon, Theon Greyjoy, Arya Stark, Joffrey Baratheon, Ned Stark, Catelyn Tully Stark, Roose Bolton, Jon Snow, Beth Cassel, Margaery Tyrell, Sandor Clegane, Cersei Lannister, Tywin Lannister, Jaime Lannister, Shireen Baratheon, Rickon Stark, Renly Baratheon, Lyanna Mormont, Wynafryd Manderly
  • Relationships: Domeric Bolton/Sansa Stark, Theon Greyjoy/Arya Stark, Wynafryd Manderly/Robb Stark, Myrcella Baratheon/Robb Stark, Joffrey Baratheon/Sansa Stark, Catelyn Stark/Ned Stark, Jon Snow/Beth Cassel, Joffrey Baratheon/Margaery Tyrell, Sansa Stark/Margaery Tyrell, Shireen Baratheon/Rickon Stark, Lyanna Mormont/Rickon Stark, Robert Baratheon/Cersei Lannister, Robert Baratheon/Lyanna Stark, Robert Baratheon/Arya Stark
  • Additional Tags: Arranged Marriage, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Domeric Bolton lives, Minor Joffrey Baratheon/Sansa Stark, Unrequited Love, Love, Deception, Affairs


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yXkEJi

tags: you know he'd renounce the Targ name just to be Jon Stark
title: Jenny of Oldstone and Sansa
body:
“High in the halls of the kings who are gone, Jenny would dance with her ghosts…” - A Storm of Swords

With all the dragonflies on her dresses and jellewery in season 1, why do I have the feeling Sansa will be the new Jenny? Falling in love with a Targaryen Prince, and surviving everyone she loves - dancing alone with her ghosts in Winterfell in the end… :’(

reblog.comment:

blog.name: asimplylucia
blog.title: Work Always Without Applause
blog.description: History nerd, fanfic writer, film noir lover.

summary: The first chapter of my film noir AU fic is ready! A huge ‘thank you’ to @queenoferebor1204 who edited it. Please read the...
caption:
The first chapter of my film noir AU fic is ready! A huge ‘thank you’ to @queenoferebor1204 who edited it. Please read the warnings carefully before diving into it.

You can read it on AO3 here.

Where should I begin? With the day old Tywin Lannister took me in? I thought he was doing me a favor; now I know better than to believe the bullshit he told me. Should I begin with the moment Joffrey committed his first felony or his first serious crime?

No.

There was one afternoon where I should have paid attention. When I should have recognized the threat looming over the villa and sensed the danger.

But I was a cunt; fooled by the sweet smell of jasmine.

One little slip.

That’s all it takes.

That’s all it takes.

summary: Re Sansa ships, I shipped Jonsa before S6 due to stuff in the books but never thought it would happen, I thought Sansa/Edric...
question: Re Sansa ships, I shipped Jonsa before S6 due to stuff in the books but never thought it would happen, I thought Sansa/Edric could happen. Since Sansa&Jon reunited on the show I'm convinced Jonsa will happen in some form, I still expect Jon to die though. Sandry is a long shot but you never know because I think there will need to be new alliances between the kingdoms & marriage is the obvious way to do that. With few main characters likely to survive what marriages do you think could happen?
answer:
the problem with sansa/edric endgame is that house dayne is a minor house. unless sansa met him and fell in love very quickly in the books, i don’t see her marrying him esp when her marriage could bring kingdoms together since she has ties to 3 kingdoms. it’s still possible, after all he is strong, brave and gentle. 

book and show jonsa metas have swayed me a lot. it went from a crackship to something that could possibly be endgame. after all why mention sansa in the same breath as jon and dany? sansa can’t be the only person who disagrees with jon’s choice to bend the knee.

it’s hard because the show’s scope is pretty small. they don’t care about so many important houses. i doubt tristane will die in the books. if he had lived in the show, i would have said sansa x tristane is a possibility. tyrion’s dead. jon’s survival is dubious. euron is gone definitely and so are cersei and jaime. that leaves theon, one of the northern lords and one of the vale lords. all three are disqualified because theon has been castrated (the show treats it like a joke, like he’s less of a man. i doubt they’ll pair him with one of the main women). the only prominent vale lord is lord royce who is married. the northern lords we see are married too. that leaves a maybe alive jon.

as for arya, maybe gendry. then again d&d made the weird choice to have him not mention her once with jon. i mean sandor did. who knows? bran might marry meera or (weird i know) lyanna mormont or they’ll write him as the three eyed raven till the end because disabled people don’t deserve happy endings. if missandei survives, i think greyworm will die.

that’s it for the characters i know for sure are surviving. the rest are minor characters who don’t have romantic scenes.

blog.description: We strive to make this a quality Sansan blog free of hate for book and show fans alike. Our goal is to provide inspiration and quality sansan art, fanfiction recommendations , edits, meta, discussion, confessions, head canons and prompts for you.♡ We tag NSFW content. Header gif by @kingsleigh

summary: One Little Slip - SimplyLucia - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin [Archive of Our Own]
title: One Little Slip - SimplyLucia - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/?
Fandom: A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin
Rating: Mature
Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
Relationships: Sandor Clegane/Sansa Stark, Joffrey Baratheon/Sansa Stark
Characters: Sandor Clegane, Sansa Stark, Cersei Lannister, Joffrey Baratheon, Petyr Baelish, Meryn Trant, Boros Blount, Loras Tyrell, Margaery Tyrell, Falyse Stokeworth, Pycelle (ASoIaF), Balon Swann, Dontos Hollard, Tyrion Lannister
Additional Tags: Film Noir AU, Film Noir, Alternate Universe - 1950s, 1950s, major character death implied, POV First Person, California, San Diego, Bittersweet Ending, Flashback, Violence, mafia, Implied/Referenced Self-Harm, Abuse, Heavy Drinking, Pyrophobia, Voyeurism, Dubious Consent, Mildly Dubious Consent, Masturbation, Multiple References to Film Noir
Summary:

San Diego, 1955. A lonely girl in a fancy villa and a man spying on her, knowing she’s out of his reach.
“Life’s a ball game. You gotta take a swing at whatever comes along before you find it’s the ninth inning” (Detour, 1945)

title: One Little Slip
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QlRIRT

by SimplyLucia

San Diego, 1955. A lonely girl in a fancy villa and a man spying on her, knowing she’s out of his reach.
“Life’s a ball game. You gotta take a swing at whatever comes along before you find it’s the ninth inning” (Detour, 1945)

Words: 1777, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

🙅🏻 I Block Demons 🙅🏻

summary: I'm confused. If Jon ends as King of 7k, it's Targaryen restoration. If Sansa marries him, house Stark is dead. There's no...
question: I'm confused. If Jon ends as King of 7k, it's Targaryen restoration. If Sansa marries him, house Stark is dead. There's no Stark, no northern independence, north again is under another Targaryen.
answer: You assume that Jon will be taking the throne under the name Targaryen. I don’t make that assumption. He can reject his Targaryen name and rule under the name Stark. Even if he doesn’t take the name Stark, his children could still have that name. There will be no Targaryen restoration.

reblog.comment: You assume that Jon will be taking the throne under the name Targaryen. I don’t make that assumption. He can reject his Targaryen name and rule under the name Stark. Even if he doesn’t take the name Stark, his children could still have that name. There will be no Targaryen restoration.

trail.content_raw: You assume that Jon will be taking the throne under the name Targaryen. I don’t make that assumption. He can reject his Targaryen name and rule under the name Stark. Even if he doesn’t take the name Stark, his children could still have that name. There will be no Targaryen restoration.
trail.content: You assume that Jon will be taking the throne under the name Targaryen. I don’t make that assumption. He can reject his Targaryen name and rule under the name Stark. Even if he doesn’t take the name Stark, his children could still have that name. There will be no Targaryen restoration.

summary: Weirdly, I ship Sansa with Edric Dayne.  I never shipped her with anybody before (don't like any of the "romance prospects" in...
question: Weirdly, I ship Sansa with Edric Dayne.  I never shipped her with anybody before (don't like any of the "romance prospects" in her narrative).  Somebody said that they shipped her with Edric and the more I think about it the more I like this ship. The little I've seen of him I like (He seems to be a sweet, polite, nice boy and I think they will mesh well)  Wishful thinking on my part since I'm not a fan of Jon, don't like anybody else and I want to see Dorne in season 8.  What do you think?
answer:
They’re the same age which makes them 100x better than her other ships. He seems like a good person. From what I remember he broke away from Lady Stoneheart because he didn’t agree with her actions. The more I think about it, the better this ship looks.

I’m with you anon on the shipping part. I don’t really have a Sansa ship. I used to be into Sansaery but I’m indifferent to it because of Margaery having sex with an underage boy which reminded me that Sansa is much younger than her. I don’t care for Jon though I like the Jonsa fandom. Sansa x Brienne has an age gap and that spark that would draw me in doesn’t exist. Sansa x Dany has potential because of the whole enemies to friends to lovers but then again I’ve only seen soft lesbian aesthetics which I find unrealistic. Sansa x Theon is OK. I don’t know why it’s hard for me to find a Sansa ship that gives me feelings.

summary: What's your ideal ending for got vs what do you think will happen?
question: What's your ideal ending for got vs what do you think will happen?
answer:
Ideal endgame

- Jon, Dany and Tyrion die

- Sansa is queen of various southern kingdoms

- Bran gets his humanity back because he’s the protagonist of the books and he becomes King in the North

- Arya does stuff that satisfy her stans so they can end their obsession with Sansa

- Feudalism is breaking down

- The seasons are normal again. Nothing lasts for years

- The slave rebellion continues with an actual brown woman leading it

What will happen

- Jon, Dany and Tyrion die

- Sansa is a leader over unspecified regions

- Bran remains the way they’ve written him in S7

- Arya’s story ends unsatisfactorily and we have to deal with her awful stans for the next few years

- Feudalism remains strong

- Essos, Dorne, the Reach are all forgotten

tags: sansa stark wants you to make sure you’re registered to vote in this next election!
summary: tonight wasn’t perfect. I’m sad the Beto/Gillum/Abrams lost, but thank you to everyone who voted today. We’re looking at the...
body:
tonight wasn’t perfect. I’m sad the Beto/Gillum/Abrams lost, but thank you to everyone who voted today. We’re looking at the highest turnout in a midterm election in 20+ years!!!


Also - don’t minimize the positives. We have control of the house. We can subpoena the angry cheeto. My home state defended trans rights, re-elected an outspoken female senator and sent our first black congresswomen to Washington. There were also a lot of firsts across the country. The first openly gay governor! The first two muslim congresswomen! The first female Native American congresswoman! Progress was made and our voices have been heard loud and clear - get ready for 2020!

summary: To @catthewall and anyone else feeling hesitant to join the exchange I still think you should join. Whether this is your first...
caption:
To @catthewall and anyone else feeling hesitant to join the exchange I still think you should join. Whether this is your first time creating something for the SanSan fandom or scared that you might not finish in time, taking the chance and putting your work out there is definitely worth the risk. And if you do join and you are worried about your gift you can always get help from the Santa’s Little Helpers to give you a hand with whatever you need. 

This event is about coming together to make the holiday season a little cheerier for someone else and that definitely will happen no matter how your present comes out because it was something you took the time to make especially for them. So I think whoever wants to join should jump in head first and sign-up!
